{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA9500 |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B017NT8Q24 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/08/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117B |manuf_rev=AC44 -ALU |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA9500 |ic_id=3839A-EA9500 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58BVG0S3HTA00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GD16EWXC-12H |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG;; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50212EB1;B50212EB1KMLG; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;8; ,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |flags=MU-MIMO |stock_boot=CFE; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''2165''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''1000''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''5300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC5400 MU-MIMO Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9500/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA9500|pid=01t34000003qSnmAAE}} *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9500 Q87-EA9500], [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2773801 FCC label] - PSU 12V/5A *[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2773800 FCC Doc] - Manuf. [[Arcadyan]] WG9117BAC44 :"PN: 141911720044J R0A1" is silkscreened on the LED board. :"PN: 141911720043J R0A2" is silkscreened on the main board. {{WiFiCert|WFA62427|10/13/2015}} ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/broadcom-announces-industrys-most-advanced-5g-wifi-router-platform-300092180.html ''BCM4709C0''] @1.4GHz DualCore (ARM Cortex-A9) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] + 1x 4T4R N [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] @800MHz :SoC (ARM Cortex A7), 4x4 MU-MIMO, 40/80MHz, QAM-1024 :DualBand, NitroQAM, 5GHz (2x 2165Mbps), 2.4GHz (1000Mbps) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32998-linksys-ea9500-max-stream-ac5400-mu-mimo-gigabit-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] **CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0 (KFEBG) @1.4GHz (Dual-Core ARM) **RAM: 256 MB (DDR3), Flash: 128 MB (NAND) **2.4 GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 4x4 802.11n SoC *** [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4 GHz Power Amplifier (x4) **5 GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 4x4 802.11ac SoC *** [[RFMD]] RFPA5542 5 GHz Power Amplifier Module (x8) **PCIe: ''PLX Technology'' PEX8603 - 3-lane, 3-port PCIe switch **Switch: in [[Broadcom]] BCM53125 - GbE (1x WAN, 8x LAN) ===See also=== [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] *[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] ==Images== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/218-linksys-ea9500/ ''Linksys EA9500'' photos on '''OpenITforum'''] __NOTOC__
